评论概述: Trendy Oversized Style Jacket That Looks Great, But A little Thin....
评论详情: This windbreaker is a lightweight varsity-style jacket that's trendy and stylish. It features a relaxed, oversized fit, classic varsity-style design, and zip-up front closure. It's made from lightweight polyester and is perfect for layering or as a light outerwear piece.  The polyester fabric may retain heat, which makes it a bit muggy in warmer weather. The fabric also doesn't have much stretch, do make sure you size up if you need a little wiggle room. The jacket is very thin, so it doesn't provide sufficient insulation for colder weather conditions either.  Overall, this jacket is trendy, stylish, and has a great fit. The materials aren't the highest performing regarding breathability and insulation, but the style and cost make it a worthwhile purchase.
This windbreaker is cute, it’s great for layering and I like the color. Very nice and trendy

评论概述: Properly sized for the oversize look
评论详情: You don't have to buy this in a larger size to get the oversized look, which I appreciate. It's also really cute: the green design is the exact vibe I pictured it would be. However, I'm not a fan of the material since it's that type of parachute material that's really thin and makes a lot of noise when you move. I would say this is the perfect layering type of jacket for warmer weather: adds a ton of style and doesn't heat you up too much. Not ideal if you're looking for an actual windbreaker.
This is light and I love the colors

This windbreaker is exactly as pictured in the photos on the product listing. The colors look great, and the quality seems to be there as well. I did not notice any issues with the stitching, zipper, or otherwise. The material is lightweight and comfortable, exactly as you would expect from this type of jacket. I was able to wash and dry this jacket with no issues. It is definitely longer and wider than your standard size jacket, however, it is obviously meant to be. So, I would say it fit as expected. For reference, I am 5’4”, 125 lbs and ordered a small. Very happy with it!
